I like the ease of pulling up my card to scan and that of my guest. There are some nice videos/tutorials for people who need ideas for exercises or do not know how to use the equipment.
Title: Ok app

Content: I only like using the PF App with my Apple Watch as I don‚Äôt like carrying my phone with me into the gym. Can‚Äôt tell you how many times I have to refresh the app on  my watch when checking in, but here‚Äôs the kicker, you can‚Äôt refresh it without your phone. What‚Äôs the point of having the app on your watch if this is constantly happens. It‚Äôs more annoying than anything. ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
Title: App on Apple Watch is a joke

Content: While this app is wonderful when it actually works and it did last year - I can‚Äôt say I can honestly give a good review to any app that hasn‚Äôt worked for me in months; it hasn‚Äôt loaded past the initial screen since last year! It makes it less worth while to even go to Planet Fitness in the first place on days when I‚Äôm not working out at home or outside and that means money wasted and any friend who‚Äôd like to come feel it‚Äôs not worth going to that particular gym - when in reality it‚Äôs quite nice.
Title: Dismayed

Content: I like the app, it‚Äôs how I signed up as a black card member but after a day with the app it says ‚Äúretrieving membership‚Äù and it‚Äôs just stuck there spinning around like it‚Äôs going to do something but nothing happens.  I deleted the app reinstalled it and cleared cache and reset my signal but to no avail. Please fix :(
Title: Great app but‚Ä¶

Content: The app works well enough, but it entirely lacks the option to change your membership, payment information or cancel your membership. The only way to do any of these things is in person or by written mail, which is absolutely ridiculous at this point. This obviously is just a foul tactic to make it difficult for paying members to cancel or downgrade their membership. Frankly, it‚Äôs one I don‚Äôt plan on supporting any longer.
Title: Doesn‚Äôt let you manage payment or membership

Content: There isn‚Äôt much to do on the app besides finding a trainer. Adding a feature to help keep up with the workouts. Ex. Monday I do legs and I did 3 plates, I most likely won‚Äôt remember that but if the app had an option of scanning the QR and having an area where I can put down some notes or set up a workout plan etc. then next Monday I want to challenge myself and do 4 plates... will give 5 stars if feature is added. I don‚Äôt need a trainer, I like to do my own thing. Help the customers that is like me out.
Title: Suggestion

Content: Just my two cents.  It would be nice if we could have a workout routine tab on the app.  Many of us don‚Äôt have time to set up our own routine through your videos.  Just give us a few option routines and switch them up every few weeks.  Another option I would LOVE to see is how many people are in the gym live.  If I plan my workout for 5 pm but at 2 pm there‚Äôs 100 less people then I‚Äôd go at 2 pm.  :).  Would have expected more from a big gym like this.  I will be deleting.  Thank you.
Title: New to Planet

Content: It‚Äôs a nice app for workout guidelines and informative. But I have found the ‚Äúcrowd meter‚Äù is wildly inaccurate. For people who are in a hurry it‚Äôs nice to plan based on crowd level. It never has a meter past 2/10 at my gym , but I was just there and the ‚Äúcapacity‚Äù for the building is 310 and I counted over 150 people at the gym , yet the meter wasn‚Äôt past 2/10. Why have that function if its inaccurate ?
Title: Informative but inaccurate

Content: I‚Äôm over 40 and had acl reconstruction.  I‚Äôve been coming to PF as part of the rehabilitation.  I use the snap a work out to see how far I am progressing.  The app holds my black card for scan.  I can‚Äôt use it to book a trainer class, hopefully that gets fixed soon.  I‚Äôve used the videos to learn machines.  Wish the elliptical one was a bit more beginner user training.    The app does what I need it to do.
Title: Old Lady ACL

Content: Unfortunately, Planet Fitness no longer has key tags to scan in when entering the gym, so the app is the only option. It's been over a week and my app won‚Äôt even load. I‚Äôve updated my phone and the app and it never loads. I‚Äôve made sure that my connection was strong, and it still will not load to my membership barcode. No matter where I go, I cannot access my membership. It's frustrating and kinda disappointing considering I pay $24 a month to use this gym.
Title: App Won‚Äôt Load

Content: The app is frustrating and not user friendly.  The people counter that tells you how many people are in the gym is NOT ACCURATE. It‚Äôs only a guess at how many they think will be there‚Ä¶ why sign in if you don‚Äôt keep track.   The gym has teenagers making out on the machines and the people working say it‚Äôs fine.   I tried to work out after work all week last week, and can‚Äôt because it‚Äôs flooded with teenagers that sit on a machine and then watch Netflix instead of working out.
Title: Not worth the money

Content: If I‚Äôm giving u my major credit card you should not need my checking account information. Not to add your wanting me to give this on a public tablet. Absolutely not. One form of payment should be enough or allow me to add 2 different credit cards. All I can say is dumb. I‚Äôm not signing my kids to a work out center. Not to add years ago I only needed a credit card if it got declined I needed to pay when I came in.
Title: Payment guarantee ridiculous

Content: By reading the previous reviews, it is obvious that people are not happy with the ‚Äúnew‚Äù updated app.  Yes or no, will the Check-in history feature be reinstalled? If it‚Äôs not, then I will be deleting the app.  I understand that I can access this information by logging into my account from my PC, or going up to the front desk at the gym, and asking for the info. However, I don‚Äôt bring my PC or laptop to the gym, nor do I like to go up to the front desk, they are busy enough, as is.  So, please, save me the waiting time , yes or no, will it be brought back???
Title: Not functional

Content: I've just recently downloaded this app on both my iPhone and iPad. I like the way it looks and so far find it fairly easy to use. I like that I can have the app on both devices. I also like the way it lets you log in when you go to the facility to work out. I would highly recommend this app!!
Title: Planet Fitness

Content: I really enjoy the app because it allows you to see possible workouts you can do. As well as, log your workouts to see how your week went. It helps with accountability. The app used to show your check in history and now it doesn‚Äôt, i wish they would bring that back for the app. Other than that the app is worth downloading.
Title: Enjoy the app but..

Content: Started out great when I joined a couple of weeks ago. Now when I click on the app it just continues to buffer and I can‚Äôt sign in in order to check in at the desk. The one feature I really use it for, and since there are no cards to use‚Ä¶I find this very irritating! It prolongs the check in time. I have deleted and re-added the app several times, offloaded it, restarted my phone, all with the same result. Please fix this!
Title: It WAS great‚Ä¶..

Content: I just got a series 8 watch and I was trying to use the key tag but keeps saying I need to login and link to Mobil app. I watched a couple of videos and there‚Äôs a setting to link watch that‚Äôs missing from the Mobil app for some reason.
Title: Not allowing my Apple Watch to link

Content: Joined yesterday. Downloaded app. Told to create account. Wouldn‚Äôt let me. People at location I signed up with said lots of people having that problem and they couldn‚Äôt help (they tried). Been trying for two days. Couldn‚Äôt even contact support through the app in the space provided. After I hit submit for my problem description, got message that an ‚Äúunexpected error‚Äù has occurred. Good to know my error is different from all the errors they have come to expect.
Title: Can‚Äôt create account

Content: Great app. I like having my barcode on my phone. I like being able to record my workouts, but I wish there was a way to record weightlifting other then just choosing weightlifting as a category. You can't put in what you did, how many reps at what weight, etc. That's the only issue I've had so far. I might be missing something though. I just started using.
Title: Great So Far

Content: Apparently the app is a corporate product because my local gym can‚Äôt help me.  The last two years I haven‚Äôt been able to login to my PF account because my key tag is identified with another account!  I‚Äôve spent so much time trying to resolve such a simple issue.  App support is slow to respond to emails, phone calls prove worthless as tech support can‚Äôt see what‚Äôs wrong, I‚Äôve been given three new key tags by my local gym nothing works.  It‚Äôs a joke.  It‚Äôs clear the low cost of gym membership has lead to inadequate tech support.
Title: Horrible Tech Support

Content: Update 2: this app is garbage and frankly any company this unfriendly to consumers deserves to fail. Deleting and won‚Äôt be renewing my subscription.  Update: they lied when they said they would bring functionality back. You still can‚Äôt review your check in history on the app even though you could before. I wish I could give negative stars.  They updated the app and removed the ability to view your check in history.  Removing features is not okay and this will remain one star until they bring it back.
Title: Removed features

Content: Change always takes getting use to and the PF app was no different.  At first I did not like the new activity list options and the lack of mileage tracking, but I‚Äôve gotten use to it and accept it.  I would give it a 5 Star rating if it could track the mileage but it doesn‚Äôt so it gets 4 Stars.
Title: Change always takes getting use to ‚Ä¶

Content: I would prefer if instead of your days going away after the year past they should have a all time as well that way you can trade your days better but other than that I really like this all
Title: I love this app it helps a lot

Content: The app works fine. I‚Äôm not sure why there‚Äôs not a feature to track your actual workout. I want to be able to keep up with which exercises or machines I did, the amount lifted, number of reps, etc. Please consider this feature. Other than that, the app works fine but it‚Äôs overkill for one thing and missing much more functional features.
Title: Workout log

Content: App is straightforward and easy to use. However, when scheduling PF classes the app doesn‚Äôt show when classes are cancelled; easy to waste a trip if the trainer is out, since you can still sign up for a cancelled class. Also, most of the workouts in the app are fairly short; didn‚Äôt see anything longer than 30 minutes.
Title: Easy to use, but limited

Content: I have always joined a gym wherever I moved from different work locations. I‚Äôve seen ( And discontinued membership) the dirtiest and lack of staff to the best , that being Planet Fitness.  I have no financial or employment; This gym is not only clean, but has more modern equipment, restrooms, lockers I cannot ever belonging to any gym anywhere.
Title: Cleanest Gym, very attentive staff!!

Content: This is a great app, but I‚Äôm only posting this review to report a small bug. The form that asks the user what gyms they have previously belonged to has a bunch of checkboxes. In my region, one of the checkboxes is Gold‚Äôs Gym. The form does not allow the user to proceed with Gold‚Äôs Gym selected because that string includes an apostrophe.
Title: Bug Report

Content: It‚Äôs like 3 clicks to check in, I don‚Äôt know what the 1 star reviews are about regarding that. I mean, its only use is that, but I‚Äôve not struggled too much to check in, which is all the app is good for.  I rate planet fitness at a 1 though because they have no option to pay like a regular business with cash or card and require ridiculous nonsense like account and routing to sign up. The app works to check in, however, much worse problems are still existing.
Title: What are the reviews talking about???

Content: Please let tanning appointments be made on the app!!! My home club requires appointments and from what I understand eventually all will? They can‚Äôt be made over the phone. So you have to go in to the club and can only make an appointment 2 hours in advance. That doesn‚Äôt work out for people with work schedules. I cannot leave my job to go make an appointment then come back to work for an hour then go back to the club for my appointment. Poorly thought out plan.
Title: Please let appointments be made

Content: I‚Äôve been using the app to check in to the gym mostly, but I‚Äôve noticed lately that the inbox doesn‚Äôt work properly. Most of my messages are duplicated and I can‚Äôt delete them nor remove the notification that I have new messages. Otherwise, it suits my needs.
Title: Pretty happy but buggy

Content: First of all,  the crowd meter is never accurate! I‚Äôve been there when it‚Äôs low and a ton of people are there. Like no cardio machines, every one is waiting for the good machines and no where to stretch. And I‚Äôve been there when the crowd meter is medium and empty. Annoying!   But I like the instructional videos for all types of their machines, variations and search functions to make it easier. The app is ok.
Title: Decent App

Content: Try to get app support just goes right to their join site -I am a member ..  Can you make it easier to log  planet fitness exercise/s on each machine (like time ) say cardio warm up (machine and time )  then like in the video machin demo there is a filter search just check off and build your routine and then log weight reps / or time. there is no how to navigate can we use this app to track and log our person progress ? it‚Äôs just group log like weight lift - golf ect which is good   also being we check in with scan do we get a log in record of our gym times.? if so where? not easily usable or found   or is just a how to app (short intro how to) greeting  People love an interactive app which  equals massive growth. !!:-)  ok I hope this gets to the support for apps as the link did not.
Title: app support right

Content: I love planet fitness and I love the app. However, they just updated the app and some of my favorite features are gone. For instance, I got the black card membership because I live by one location and work by another. So with that membership I can visit either one based on my schedule. The old app I could schedule classes at either location and more. Now, I can only schedule classes at my home location, which isn‚Äôt either of the 2 I go to anymore.
Title: Lost features

Content: Do yourself a favor and never go to this gym. Also once you sign in on the app, you can‚Äôt unsubscribe on the app, as they advertise. You will have to mail a letter or go to their location and they will ask you 300 questions about why you want to cancel your membership. Yeah, it‚Äôs cheap but they will make sure to double charge you a few times. Customer service? Forget about it. You never will be right. Go to your local gym, save some time and money.
Title: Take your money somewhere else.

Content: The app is as easy to use as going to planet fitness. Love that you can snap a pic of your workout info on the machines or have the option to write it in. I‚Äôm really hoping to get back to leveraging the app a lot more because I am working on going to the gym 5 to 7 days a week like last year. It‚Äôs time to keep my body in tip top shape and not just for important events.
Title: Love the gym and the app

Content: This place is mostly clean and people who work there are also somewhat nice and friendly. The only thing to  make improvement is keep up with cleaning supplies upto date. Meaning cleaning paper are out or running low. So to clean the machines sometimes you have to go to other end.
Title: It‚Äôs better place to work out and get good results if you go there regularly

Content: It‚Äôs a nice app but feel like it could do better. With a better Ui. Seem out of date. also should be able to put my Blackcard in apple wallet for a faster check in with guest card. The app needs a fresh theme. This one is not keeping up with most apps in 2023.
Title: It‚Äôs ok

Content: I gave this app a review as a new customer back in September 2022.  I received the suggestions from the developer.  Tried them all.  Same problem.  Still cannot log in.  I do see the new logo, still get same error message.  I am on the Wi-Fi AT MY HOUSE.  BY MYSELF.  Still tells me there‚Äôs a connection issue and to make sure I‚Äôm connected to a Wi-Fi signal.  I have done everything I know how to do.  Everything I was told to do.  Nothing.  Very VERY disappointed with this app.
Title: [Update] Can‚Äôt log in. Can‚Äôt find help. PLEASE FIX

Content: I have downloaded this app, deleted it, restarted my phone, and downloaded it again several times just to get a response of ‚ÄúOops! Connection Failure‚Äù. I have an iPhone 12 and 5G service-there is no failure to connect on my end. Please fix this issue soon so I can check in without having to yell at anyone for not understanding they need to check me in with my club number since my home club is completely infested with toxic mold (Gunn Hwy in Tampa) for which I am calling the Fl Department of Health about tomorrow.
Title: Connection Failure

Content: I was excited to install this app, only for it to be difficult to sign in. I provided my email and password but when I tried to sign in it said it needed a verification that I received an email from them.  I have NOT received any verification email from the app so I can NEVER sign into the app. I looked all over my inbox and junk mail. Waited over 1/2 hour thinking it may take some time to send. At this point I‚Äôm giving up. Too difficult. I understand security, but this is ridiculous for an exercise app. It‚Äôs not a bank.
Title: Horrible

Content: I haven't used in a while; had to reset pw.  When searching for sessions it's very clunky. You used to be able to scroll through day by day. Now you have to manually select the date. Also there is no add to calendar button. The email confirmation doesn't have enough info for my iPhone to recognize it as a 'event' so now i also have to manually enter a calendar entry on my phone. Also there is no way to add more exercise. I used recumbent bike. The only option is indoor cycling? Snapshot functionality is gone. Poof!
Title: Functionality gone

Content: This app was working fine in the activity section until you removed the exercise class option (which I used to describe the customized workout given to me by your trainer) and the miles walked in the walking activity have disappeared.  You have rendered this app useless to me now.  Additionally I had to jump through hoops to get this new version to work.  Very disappointed.
Title: Why did you change this?

Content: The old version of the app was clunky but provided a great way to log workouts and track weekly, monthly, and yearly. The new update makes logging and tracking these workouts too difficult to follow and does not mesh well with actual workouts in the gym. Using this New update to track your workouts is now ineffective and does not allow you to compare effectively to previous months and years. Definitely disappointed in the usefulness of the new update and wish the old version was still working.
Title: Terrible Update

Content: The new app has less information than the previous app. First it didn‚Äôt carry over some of the previous weeks information. I can‚Äôt put in information manually. Everybody doesn‚Äôt burn the same calories it depends on a variety of things. I don‚Äôt see how to view a summary of previous years or months calories burned, miles covered or time covered. Why the change? This I s terrible. It was a motivation factor to see if you could top previous months or years by having the ability to view summaries.
Title: New App No Good

Content: Almost every time that I try to click on a location in on the map it exits me out of the app completely and have to try again. Usually works the second or third time. Hope that it gets updated soon. I use the app all the time to plan my trips around the USA. I am a truck driver and try to make it every day. Also would like to see future locations to have a different icon.
Title: Keeps crashing

Content: The rest of the app is beautiful, but it will not take account information. This is frustrating especially if my gym is forcing me to import account information in this app or either come in to fix my account. Hopefully you can fix this issue.  Thank you!
Title: Billing Information Don‚Äôt Work

Content: I have no issue with PF per se, but I‚Äôm aggravated because the company who does their billing did billing for a gym I had a previous membership with and they transposed all my info from a gun account I no longer have to my new one with PF and I can‚Äôt change it nor can I figure out how to contact them.  Other than one instance where the snapshot of my workout was messed up on the app, I‚Äôve been happy with it but due to the above I can‚Äôt see my appointments, correct billing info or correct address and I‚Äôm unable to change them and save them.
Title: Abc financial

Content: Having this app on my iPhone is perfect. I don't have to have my membership tag on me, I can just scan my membership tag using my iPhone. Having said that, there should be an app for the Apple watch also, I would like to just leave my iPhone to my car and just bring in my Apple Watch with me and just scan my membership tag using my iWatch.
Title: Apple Watch App

Content: I am very disappointed with this app. I was looking forward to tracking my successes. First off the app doesn‚Äôt even work inside of my gym, to check in. I try to open it in the parking lot and it literally takes 5 minutes to load.  I have probably successfully checked in with the app 2 out of 8 times.   Second it doesn‚Äôt sync with their system and according to my app I have zero activity.
Title: Disappointed

Content: I really enjoyed this app... before the recent update. I do incline training on the treadmill and would use the photo tool to snap a quick pic and it would properly input my workout and calories based on that exercise. New update removes that, and you can‚Äôt edit the incline when manually entering waking or running. Heck, you can‚Äôt event enter the intensity on the stairclimber. It should at least offer the option to change the amount of calories burned. Can‚Äôt really track any of my progress till this is changed.
Title: Update Ruins Experience

Content: I love planet fitness! I love the app that gives you the ability for them to scan your membership number right from your phone. So you don‚Äôt have to have the little ID badge that they give you. The app also allows you to enter-workouts and has a way to use a QR reader for the machines.
Title: Team Planet!

Content: I am not able to access the key tag on my Apple Watch. I keep getting a message to synch my Apple Watch in the app on my mobile device. I have not found anything within the app that allows me to do so. Therefore, I always have to use my phone to check into one of your facilities. Kind of defeats the purpose of having the app on my watch.
Title: Apple Watch Key Tag

Content: Before you subscribe read carefully their policy they always try to make you a vow of milk. They copy and paste the same response  Shame on you   Thank you for reaching out. If you have questions or concerns related to a recent visit or experience, please contact your home club directly by going on the PF App and click ‚ÄúClub and Member Support‚Äù to submit a request a Contact Us form or call your home gym. If you have any technical questions related to the app, we would be happy to help!
Title: Thieves planet fitness

Content: It would be nice to be able to create workouts for each day. Go to the workouts, select which one you want to do, and add for that day.  Instead of searching through the workouts you could have a plan when you go to the gym or if you‚Äôre at home.
Title: Love the app but just a suggestion

Content: The app is so great! I wrote a bad review about the lack of Check-in history. Not only did they respond in a timely manner, they updated the app and added my previous Check-ins from the previous month! Very happy with their attention to detail.
Title: Planet Fitness Listens!

Content: This app does not work at all. I downloaded it and tried creating my account and it didn‚Äôt let me. I created my account and verified my email in a web browser.  Then I try to log in via the app, it says email not found. When I hit the support button in the app and detailed the issue and hit submit, I got another error message saying that it failed to submit my issue.  Literally nothing I‚Äôve tried to do in this app so far has worked
Title: App not functional

Content: Love the app. It automatically loaded to my Apple Watch but I can not link the key tag on my watch. I don‚Äôt want to have to bring my phone into the gym with me but the app on the Apple Watch won‚Äôt open the key tag. It just keeps spinning and then goes to refresh. Please fix.
Title: Unable to open key tag on Apple Watch

Content: Same as many before me today posted, I‚Äôm regretting the update.. Update usually means new & improved, but I‚Äôm not feeling that with this. I need that log-in history in my phone for easy access (yeah computer log in works, but not everyone carries their laptops around everywhere).  I‚Äôm extremely happy with the gym itself, and my membership, but this app is not very user friendly now with this update..
Title: Regretting app update...

Content: This update is ridiculous. I actually just joined planet fitness 2 weeks ago and I was really delighted to see what the old app carried. Sure it looks nicer but a lot of the core features that we loved about the old app are now gone. I design UI myself and I really think there was a way to keep the old features while still updating the UI design to be more pleasing on the eyes. The ability to snap a workout was really great and easy. I tried to record my workout today and it wouldn‚Äôt let me put the calories that the bike said I lost and when I recorded my weight in my profile the ‚Äúcalories lost‚Äù didn‚Äôt match up with what the bike said.   Probably just gonna uninstall and move to MapMyFitness and MyFitnessPal.  Such a shame.   Why ‚Äúfix‚Äù something that isn‚Äôt broke? By the looks of it, I‚Äôm not the only one who feels this way either.
Title: Ugh

Content: I have an iPhone 6 so I have to download an older version. It constantly locks up, if it even open. Very frustrating  I was told to download the most current version...AGAIN I cannot download the current version because iPhone 6 does not support iOS v14. So, the App Store forces me to download an older version that will not load (although it used to before it was upgraded) don‚Äôt bother telling me to buy a new phone, this one works fine with all apps except PF
Title: Download fail

Content: I just realized that the crowd meter is not accurate. It‚Äôs based on the average amount of people that would come into the gym at certain times. I‚Äôve been avoiding going on certain time of the day because the meter was high for me. I guess I‚Äôll have to go in to see how many people are there. It maybe had to track in real time the amount of people coming and going. I would be great if it could.
Title: Crowd meter

Content: Who knew inviting a guest had to be so hard. First I had to download an app that I did not want in my phone to send a message to the guest then they had to download the app as well and create an account just to workout in vacation one DAY!!!!!  And then after he downloads an app that he does not want and creates an account for a gym he is not a member of to get email blasted just to workout is insanity!!!  I don‚Äôt know if this is at all planet fitness locations or just a Covid thing in this state but it‚Äôs the most inconvenient thing ever.
Title: Invite a guest in app is the WORSE!!

Content: App worked great until this new,bigger,better update. Asked for email and password to open app. Tells me it‚Äôs wrong even though I know it‚Äôs right. Tell it I forgot my password. It says it will send me an email to change it...No Email! After deleting and reinstalling app and multiple attempts to log in...it locks me out! But...it will send me an email to be able to get back in. Ok, so...guess what.? No email!! Help!!  Still crap! Deleting again. And please don‚Äôt bother sending ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve fixed it‚Äù email until u do.
Title: Not working for Apple !

Content: There are so many things wrong with this app it‚Äôs hard to know where to begin.  It has no Wallet integration, so you have to open the app to get your tag for scanning every time you walk into a Planet Fitness.  You have no access to your visit history, even though PF does keep track of that.  xCapture is truly bizarre, wonky, and involves so many taps to access that it isn‚Äôt worth it.  And then most of the other app functions route you to Safari, where you have to log in, again, using a DIFFERENT ACCOUNT.  And, oh yeah, three months after the announcement of the iPhone X, this app still isn‚Äôt updated to fit on its screen.  This app gets two stars for saving me the trouble of remembering my member tag. It has no other viable purpose.
Title: ‚ÄúUpdated for new devices‚Äù... but not iPhone X?

Content: Would love to be able to check in at gym with just my Apple Watch but the app never works. It either says please log into app on mobile device or link key tag from mobile app to Apple Watch.   I always have mobile app open on my iPhone and Watch never works.   And there is no option on mobile app to link key tag to Apple Watch so I can‚Äôt figure why that would be a suggestion on the Apple Watch.   Was hoping the most recent update would have fixed it, but no go.   Seems like the developers do not know what to do as this has been a known issue for well over a year and still it does not work nor has anyone from PF made any mention of status.   Guess I have to keep carrying my phone and Watch with me when I go to the gym.
Title: Apple Watch app never works

Content: Messages can‚Äôt be deleted by user in all cases. It seems like PF has a schedule on new messages to prevent them from being deleted for a period of time, therefore it is hard to tell if you have new messages or not. The PF IT deleted the emails but now new ones have been sent with the same problem. I wish they would fix the app or mail server. Not just delete current emails. I should be give the ability to do that. Very annoying!
Title: Can‚Äôt remove messages

Content: Please implement feature adding the digital keycard to checkin to the Apple Wallet. Please also enable geolocation so that it pops up on my screen without me having to do anything once I arrive at the gym. This is a huuuuuuggee time saver bc the app takes forever and all you have to do is double press the side button to view everything in Apple Wallet
Title: Add checkin pass to Apple Wallet

Content: This is supposed to work with Apple Watch.  I have gotten it to work a couple times in the past and when it does it‚Äôs great but even with the recent update it DOES NOT connect to the watch app.  It closes out too fast on the phone app and the watch app, when it has connected, lasts longer to stay open for check in.  FIX the problem!
Title: Wearable function still doesn‚Äôt work

Content: I really enjoy using this app!  This app allows me to EASILY track my activity PRIVATELY. I wish their was a way to record the workout provided by my Trainer.  If I could have a  pre-populated spreadsheet of my workout on the app that would allow me to record activity, record time used to complete the activity and the distance of the activity, I would be VERY HAPPY!  It would save ALOT of time.
Title: App Review

Content: I‚Äôve been having nothing but problems since the update. First the app wouldn‚Äôt let me log in, reset my password a dozen times. Then planet fitness had to change my email on their server to make an account. Now the app won‚Äôt scan my card and planet fitness even switched my card in the system. I liked the app for convenience but I‚Äôm very disappointed that I‚Äôm having so many issues now. I spent 30 minutes with the staff at my location trying to work this out
Title: Update messed everything up

Content: Overall the app works great but I think a really helpful feature would be having it so that the app will let people know if there unexpected closures/delays in opening in cases of holidays or emergencies so they don‚Äôt wake up for their normal routine only to find the gym not open until later üòÇüòÖ
Title: Suggestions

Content: I don‚Äôt like how there‚Äôs a perks or black card button on the bottom home page when classes should be there. I shouldn‚Äôt have to click multiple buttons to find classes that I‚Äôm going to day of especially when I don‚Äôt even have a black card and that button is obsolete to me
Title: Classes should be at bottom, not perks or black card

Content: First time user of PF and after less than a month I had questions about the ‚Äúannual maintenance fee‚Äù and that it was so soon after signing up. I spoke with an employee at the club and there was so much confusion about when and why, that we ended up canceling my membership right there. Now that I have read the fine print I understand but now the timing is bad to re-enroll so I guess it‚Äôs time to try out a different gym. I wish the employees understood how the memberships worked.
Title: New to PF

Content: This a very good app. I would like to be a able to create my own workout using the equipment available at my club and log my daily progress on the app. I would also like to tag or pin or add to a favorites list selected scan & learn tutorials for future reference.
Title: Some things missing üëÄ

Content: Hey dev team: Can you make it so that the phone screen brightness goes up to 100% (temporarily) when the user pulls up the digital barcode feature to check in at a club? The attendants usually have a pretty hard time getting their barcode reader hardware to scan properly, if otherwise. Thank you very much
Title: Just needs one little tweak

Content: I love being able to check in with my phone! I like that you can scan the barcodes on the side of each machine. What could be better is when you scan the barcode it would bring you too a workout log for that machine you scan that you could add reps, how much weight and sets you can add in after you use that machine. That would be awesome!!!
Title: Could be a way better app.

Content: I love Planet Fitness, but the app is a disappointment. The camera scanner did not work at all, do I had to manually enter my card number in order to use my phone to check in, although my card was already programmed in with the previous version.  Also hate that we can‚Äôt see our check-ins anymore! That info is important to me for insurance purposes! Really bummed about this app! It‚Äôs not nearly as useful as it used to be.
Title: App does less than before

Content: I love the gym and the new app looks like it will be nice but they need to fix a few bugs. I can‚Äôt sign up for classes any longer. It always says there is nothing available for today and if I try and change the date the scroll bar just rolls back to today. I‚Äôve also updated my profile info a few times but it doesn‚Äôt appear to save. They put a lot of work into the redesign of the app and once the work out the bugs I think it will be great but for now it‚Äôs frustrating.
Title: Updated App

Content: I used this app to track treadmill data. Now there isn‚Äôt any option to take a photo anywhere! If I wanted an app with video workouts, I would have used something else entirely. While I appreciate the innovation, y‚Äôall have absolutely no concern for current users, as if you never use this app on a regular basis yourself. 3 menus of redundant ‚Äústart a workout!‚Äù and not one has an intuitive design. I might just leave the gym this year and find a real training program, since that‚Äôs what y‚Äôall apparently want.
Title: Ruined

Content: The Planet Fitness App has been badly in need of an update for a year or more. I struggled with it for that entire time. It was so slow and buggy. This late October Update, while badly needed and long overdue, has definitely fixed the problem. It is so fast syncing with my other Apps that I can hardly believe it. Keep it this way PF and Netpulse! Thanks!
Title: Late October Update Worked!

Content: The app needs an update to use the full screen real estate available on iPhone X and xs.  Having 2 logins, one for the app and a separate one for billing is not a great design. One login should do both.   Having an option to automatically launch the barcode display when the app is opened would make this easier to use regularly if that is the most common use case for an individual who uses the app instead of carrying the card.
Title: Needs an update

Content: I love this app. It help up stay on track at PF gym or even while outside doing runs or walks on trail by pairing with the MAP MY RUN/WALK app.   Of course the Planet Fitness Gym allows more workout options which is perfect for my hip resurfacing rehabilitate. The EDWARDSVILLE facility is an outstanding place to workout. Friendly Staff and it‚Äôs always spotlessly clean.
Title: Awesome app for staying on track.

Content: It takes way too many steps to open my key card- I have to touch my screen like 7 (I know right?!?! 7!) times and actually think about each step. If it were accessible in Apple Wallet it would cut the steps down by like 3 touches.
Title: Request for access to key card in Apple Wallet

Content: Joined planet fitness- they recommend app to get started. They promised my data was private. I explained stalker and security concerns. They promised data was ONLY for planet fitness‚Ä¶ get our app‚Ä¶ login with app LIARS You sell my data and add contact info. Liars! ======================= I deleted app. REQUEST YOU REMOVE ALL DATA ABOUT MY DOWNLOAD AND CONTACT INFO =====================  Received developer response that i was wrong & it was sent to a name listed in my contacts‚Ä¶ so DUH like i‚Äôm too stupid to know you did not already take info from my phone and other apps   Then your privacy policy states you take info from my phone and group it with biometric data,  financial data ‚Ä¶ SO I STAND BY MY REVIEW ‚Äî- LIARS   Went to their privacy policy
Title: LIARS

Content: The app is great, love the Crowd meter, and all the info available.  I would like to ask if there is a chance of getting an Apple Watch app, so that I can just check in with my watch? That would make the whole thing great!!!  Edit: with the new apple watch app, I‚Äôm perfectly happy with it!!! Thank you!
Title: Great app, great gyms!

Content: Give users the option of keeping copies of pictures submitted to record a workout. Enabling access to the camera roll can't be too difficult. That way there is a backup one could enter manually, the app already has that functionality   I've submitted a number of crisp beautiful pictures, and received an automated response saying it's unreadable
Title: Browser wrapper with potential

Content: Confirmed all my information with the club today. Despite everything being accurate in the system it still says ‚Äúgo to front desk for keycard‚Äù which of course I‚Äôve already done. So if I do not have the keycard I‚Äôm screwed, it‚Äôs a tiny piece of plastic, I‚Äôll give it a month tops. That is the only reason I wanted this app, convenience. Even if I did want to try the workouts on the app it immediately crashes as soon as you click begin. It‚Äôs a waste of space until it‚Äôs fixed. Undeniably useless.
Title: GO TO FRONT DESK

Content: Please bring back photo capture. Entering manually does not allow for all information like calories. To have to stop and enter in information manually completely disrupts fitness sequencing, especially when I only have a certain amount of time available. Additionally, I have to use my glasses to do manually enter in info, I don‚Äôt workout with my reading glasses at hand.   I like this gym and a lot of the other features of this app but this aspect of it needs to be improved.
Title: Bring back photo capture

Content: I had entered every bike ride I took this summer into workouts in the previous version and now they are all gone from mid-July through August 6th. They also no longer show distance ridden, plus new entries made with this version show zero calories. Also, it shows the wrong type of membership and it forced me to enter a new password. For people who are having trouble logging in, I used my existing email and ‚Äúupdated‚Äù my password to the same one I had already been using. That worked.
Title: I Hate This New Version

Content: I don't like giving bad ratings because I support everything that Im apart of but I don't like it when I take a snap shot or my equipment after I work out & it says it's a entry already made for that day An time when I just done my first work out of the day the time I snap it. Please overall update this app asap. It's a great app & proud to have it on my iPhone but it needs a huge update & more machine selections to do manual entries.
Title: Snapshot

Content: I'd like to be able to check in using the Apple Watch app, but when I press the Keytag button on the Watch it says "Please log in to the app using your mobile device". I'm already logged into the PF iOS app (where I can view my keytag) so not sure what's wrong. I've reinstalled both watch and phone apps, but this doesn't help.
Title: Watch app doesn't work

Content: You bone heads in charge of making this app have one important job, don't lose business but today you did. Your app times out way too soon as you are forced to look for items like routing numbers.  Then there is a confusing done button that you select when you don't see a next button and if you select this you just wasted the app past 15 minutes.  Shame on me because I did it twice.  Get off your lazy buts and fix the app for this customer planet fitness.
Title: Wasted time attempting to join

Content: It‚Äôs messed up that you have to go into your ‚Äúhome gym‚Äù or cancel by mail. It‚Äôs pretty obvious why too. So that it‚Äôs harder to cancel, forcing some people to continue to pay for the membership. PF makes it super easy to sign up, but doesn‚Äôt provide the same with cancellation. I have moved a couple of times and had to cancel this way, and it was very obnoxious. I‚Äôm currently a member but I think I‚Äôll be switching to a different gym that is more user-friendly.
Title: Messed Up

Content: The app does what the app should; however, it really needs to have the membership card available on the Apple Watch.  This would allow people to avoid having to bring in their phones, especially if they run or bike to the gym. If LA Fitness can have their app on the watch then so can PF.  Please make this happen on the next update.
Title: Good App, but...

Content: You should be able to ‚Äúfavorite‚Äù workout activities and update your daily gym visits much more efficiently than how this app is setup.   Having a ‚Äúduplicate‚Äù function for gym visits would be so helpful. Many people do the same routines weekly, this would enable users to spend less time on the app.
Title: Basic functions, needs a few upgrades

Content: They make you download the app, which is absurdly large for what it‚Äôs used for, just to sign up for a membership. But get this you have to cancel in person, or mail them a note to cancel your membership. You can‚Äôt even use the app. So to get back to my point, why is this app necessary. Also this isn‚Äôt coming from an old person who just hates technology, this is from a 21 year old who understands what features an app should have.
Title: Go to a different gym

Content: The staff at the store recommended that we sign up using the app. The app asks for account information from credit cards and checking accounts. No worries, all that is on my phone! Except that every time you minimize this app, it resets to the beginning. While I‚Äôm still going to join the gym, I very nearly walked out and went somewhere else simply because of how hard it was to enter all the data into this app
Title: Possibly the most infuriating app I have ever encountered

Content: The only thing I use this app for is checking in to my Planet. It‚Äôs absolutely worthless for tracking a workout and I‚Äôm really tired of getting the same 6 new messages every day that I can‚Äôt delete or get rid of the notifications.  I feel like o should be able to scan the machine and have it sync my workout to my Apple Watch.  As this app is now, it‚Äôs just an electronic keytag.
Title: App leaves A LOT to be desired

Content: Can you please make this app somehow make it so I can hear the T.V.s in the gym? All these t.v.s and nobody here can hear them. I don‚Äôt even own a pair of headphones with a traditional headphone plug. Everything is Bluetooth or iPhone or usbc plugs these days. It would be sooooooooo awesome if planet fitness could tie the television system channels into a way  I could watch tv while I do my cardio. To  be able to select the the channel of the T.V. Audio system in the gym with my phone through this app and then relay it to my Bluetooth headphones. Or is that too much to ask for?
Title: If only....

Content: I really wish I had not updated my app. I had to start a whole new profile and lost all my data from previous workouts. I was very surprised and disappointed that once again, the arc machine was not included in the workouts. You can no longer track the calories burned nor can you track distance. This was one app I used consistently and for me, I‚Äôve literally lost everything. I have no use for this app aside from being able to use it to sign in. üò°
Title: Favorite features missing

Content: 1.  Slowest app on my phone now. I have to load the app when I leave my house if I expect it to be loaded by the time I get to my local planet fitness.  2.  After this last update the app made me log in again and even though I had my password correct it made me pick a new one. THEN it didn‚Äôt save that one....so I‚Äôm back to the previous password.  3.  Clicking the ‚Äúsupport‚Äù button on the app locks the app entirely.   AVOID THE APP, at least until they hire a company who actually understands IOS programming!
Title: With the new update, TOTAL CRAP

Content: I‚Äôve been going to planet (on/off) for about three years now and every time I come back, they treat me good. The stuff is very friendly, answered any questions you might have. They even have a trainer there if you need that extra help.
Title: Great Gym

Content: I wrote a few weeks ago about the activity tracker not working. Thanks for your response. My iPad I use the tracker on updated yesterday, and when I tried the app, everything worked! I don‚Äôt know if the app needed the update, or my iPad did, but everything is up, so thanks
Title: Tiffany

Content: I know planet fitness is the place to hate sometimes for good reasons. But I started working for 8 years now and planet fitness works just great. Just get my lift done kick rocks ( you see some weird stuff in there not gonna lie, but nothing to crazy yet).
Title: Not bad

Content: i recently switched from vasa to planet fitness due to location/driving distance.   i really like the vasa app because it shows how many check ins i‚Äôve had per month. it‚Äôs nice to keep track of my fitness and they give you free little badges or encouragement when you get more check ins.   please make something like this!!
Title: Vasa has a better app

Content: I used to be able to track my workouts and see my average minutes per day as well as see a graph of the past month. There used to be a chart that would show how many minutes you worked out in the past month. Everything is completely different in the new update and I can no longer see the graphs. This update is extremely disappointing and I wish I could uninstall it.
Title: I hate the new update

Content: They don‚Äôt let us transfer the membership to the different Locations from the app. I went to the gym and they said go to the location you want to transfer to then I called the Location and they said Go to our website and change it from there. When it comes to the cancellation of the membership planet Fitness is not the easy One
Title: No judgement Zone

Content: This is the only way to get your barcode, so you have to download it and give it your info to screenshot and not conveniently access the card, or you can have an 800th app on your phone lol I‚Äôd rather just use my id  Update: the employees were either untrained or one of you is lying, because they don‚Äôt me explicitly there‚Äôs no other way to access the club AFTER I signed up, I also saw you say in another review to use the app o access your barcode, what‚Äôs true?
Title: Disabling

Content: Awful company and awful app. Virtually impossible to retrieve your information and attempt to cancel a membership. I had to call my bank and block all their charges and report them to the BBB.  I successfully cancelled my memebership, received confirmation through my email and they still kept trying to charge me for the next three months. I filed a fraud report.  After my bank blocked their charges, they started trying to charge my secondary card. Stay away from these evil people.
Title: Awful thieves

Content: If they enforced their rules it would be perfect. The express 30min area is a joke. There‚Äôs signs everywhere that say the area is for express workouts only and it‚Äôs strictly monitored. What a joke. I‚Äôve never been able to complete a 30min workout because of people loitering on the equipment as if it‚Äôs the cell phone waiting area. I‚Äôve never seen anyone monitor the area whatsoever. It renders the 30min express are useless. I honestly don‚Äôt think there‚Äôs any management in force at the place. Bathrooms are beyond disgusting. Men‚Äôs room is rarely cleaned.
Title: It could be great

Content: OMG, I hate the new app so much!   1. Can‚Äôt take pictures of your machine to log workouts anymore. 2. Manual logging only, doesn‚Äôt log calories burned.  3. Can‚Äôt lookup Class schedule at other clubs anymore, only your home club.  4. Can‚Äôt do a ‚ÄúFind Club‚Äù for when you‚Äôre traveling. 5. Can‚Äôt upload pictures to the Planet of Triumphs anymore.  This app is a disaster and has totally changed my impression of PF. I used to feel like my PF app was my buddy, my partner, and showed me that PF cared about making my experience fun and enjoyable and I loved coming. Now I feel like PF has proven that they‚Äôre just like other gyms that don‚Äôt care about what their members want...but instead they put too many bells and whistles into this update that we don‚Äôt want or need. Please bring back the old app, this one is TERRIBLE!!!!
Title: PLEASE BRING BACK THE OLD APP!!

Content: Wish I could give 0 starts. The previous version may not have been slick, but it was functional. You could enter time, distance and calories on aerobic activities. The new version only allows time and computes an average calorie count. This is completely useless and wrong since any amount of work depends not only time but also weight and activity level (eg, hills, sprints, etc). The machines do all this but the app discards all of that and records crap. I want to return to the previous version.
Title: Horrible Changes Made

Content: I would give this app a 5 but I used it quite a bit before the update. I was able to Snap a workout and saved me so much time than having to worry about entering each number. I don‚Äôt like that it assumes how many calories were burned. It also erased ALL my August workouts when it updated. It doesn‚Äôt even have the treadmill option.. it‚Äôs not as user friendly as the other one was. Please return the snap a workout piece or include the calories and miles worked...
Title: Not a fan of the update

Content: The app works great for checking in and finding nearby clubs. The works out section is also helpful. However, the app should update to reflect holiday hours. I shouldn‚Äôt have to drive to my local gym to find out it‚Äôs closed when the app only shows regular hours.
Title: Good app but‚Ä¶

Content: Standing at the desk for 10 minutes trying to scan my guest and I in the workout the center (741 planet fitness Fresno) ZERO success!!! I come with my guest daily but today seemed to be a issue.. not sure what‚Äôs going on with you guys system but my work out was canceled do to the person at the frontline desk not knowing where to find my information to scan us in manually. Better training on you guys end for y‚Äôall staff would be much appreciated.
Title: Unsatisfied customer!!

Content: This app is definitely helpful if you‚Äôre newer at the gym or struggle with ideas for specific moves on more versatile equipment.  It would be really cool if in the future it could be possible build a workout playlist or save a group of workouts together for different days somehow.
Title: Useful

Content: I tried to get another key tag as mine is wore and the planet fitness doesn‚Äôt issue them anymore and said they use the app. So I opened my app and requires iOS of 13 or higher. So I can‚Äôt open the app or use it. Also use the gym time to turn my phone off and get away from it. I wish someone from pf would reach out as my home gym Wouldn‚Äôt do anything. If I can get in I‚Äôm guess I will go back To anytime or use crunch now since they are expanding...Banks Yancey
Title: The app is stupid.

Content: App is easy! Only complaint is that I can‚Äôt record the 30 min. Work out. It needs an ‚Äúother‚Äù button or something just so I can at least log it! I didn‚Äôt do ‚Äúyard work‚Äù I did the ‚Äú 30 min. Circuit! Let me record that pls! However I do like the videos it provides!
Title: App is fine, wish I could record 30 min. Work out!

Content: I give the app a 5/5 BUT it could have more stuff added. It‚Äôs great for checking the crowd meter, watching tutorials, etc. Something to add could be Perkville points under the Perks section. It would make keeping up with those much easier!
Title: Perks

Content: Love the app just one thing would make it better. Add a Apple wallet card for membership for people that wear just the Apple Watch to the gym. The membership card inside the app is great. But sometimes I don‚Äôt bring my iPhone with me to the gym. Just wear the Apple Watch for convenience.
Title: Add Apple wallet for membership card.

Content: Once the new app was created I downloaded it. I‚Äôve been trying to load my key tag within the app whether via the camera or manually and I keep getting the ‚Äòoops something went wrong‚Äô message. I‚Äôve even had the PF associate attempt to help (as instructed by the app) and they weren‚Äôt able to do it either.   Come on now... ü§î  The 2 star rating is because it looks cool, if only it worked for my IPhone.
Title: App will not capture my tag number

Content: Maybe I‚Äôm in the minority, but the old app was SO much better! I suppose if you are new to working out & don‚Äôt know where to start it would be OK. But there‚Äôs nothing to it but workout & exercise suggestions. I used the old app the track my sign in-sign outs, & log my workouts to add the info to my overall training record. None of these functions are in the new version. I now use it only to check it.
Title: Update is not an improvement!

Content: I love that you can register for a class through the app rather than having to create an account. However the calendar in the app doesn‚Äôt adjust when there is a holiday, such as today, Labor Day. The app allowed me to register for a class, but my location didn‚Äôt have ANY classes scheduled for today, the holiday. Can‚Äôt you correct this? Thank you.
Title: Thanks for the updates, but...

Content: I‚Äôm missing two weeks worth of activity logs with this latest update. Also, the ‚ÄúOther‚Äù option is gone and you can no longer input your own calories. There‚Äôs no treadmill option and the calories the app calculated was only a third of wha the machine said I burned. Please bring those options back when logging activity!
Title: Not liking the latest update

Content: Most disappointed that the snap a workout is gone in the new version. There is no feature for recording the results for most of the equipment in the gym. The manual input for work outs lacks simple things like treadmill or gardening.  Response to developer‚Äôs response:  No you can‚Äôt!  There is no option to add a treadmill workout, or most of the equipment in the gym. I add playing baseball, but there is no baseball diamond in your gym. I need to be able to track what I do in the gym.
Title: Looks nice, but a step backwards in what it offers.

Content: The new app will not allow me to log in. I have tried creating a new account and using my existing account (that I used for the old app with no problems). I‚Äôve restarted the app and deleted and reinstalled. The problem still exists. I tried sending an email to support, but received an error message. I‚Äôve tried to talk to the PF staff, and they don‚Äôt know how to resolve the issue. I would not recommend this app as it seems to have many issues.
Title: App continuously has problems logging in

Content: The previous version of the app had a (hard to find) way to view your check-in history. The new version seems to be missing that feature completely. I only use the app to check in and check my history, so it's barely useful for me now. Update: The response is to go to their website, so I guess the app is actually useless for me now? I can just use my keytag to check in and save the space on my phone...thanks for the info!
Title: Missing check-in history info?

Content: -Much harder to navigate after update.  -No more photo capture... have to input all workout s manually now.  -Still haven‚Äôt figured out how to go back further than last month to see workouts & totals. Hope info isn‚Äôt gone. -Appears to be a lot less info and options, unfortunately.  Overall so far it seems this was a downgrade for customers. Wish I could get the old version back.
Title: Better before update

Content: The app usually works fine but recently when I try to pull up my membership it gets stuck on the loading page. Even when I close the app and open it back up, it stays on the page. Someone needs to fix this! I have to delete it and then redownload it to do what I want.
Title: Bugs

Content: I had the app and I couldn't even put down the workouts I did that day, so it wasn't useful for me anymore and I deleted the app. Then a few weeks later I decided to download it again and now I can't even login to my account. It says if the app was updated to create a new account. So I tried to do that but then they say my account exist already and just sign in, but I can't. I even rested my password and it still doesn't let me login. I just gave up and deleted the app again. üòí
Title: I can't even use it

Content: This app really needs to be updated. It rans in low res mode on iPhone 6/6s/7 Plus, I does not integrates with Apple Wallet (a highly desired feature), and the app is pretty hard to understand and navigate, especially in "my profile" section (it's just a web view inside the app, really weird). And first run, uh... At first you have to create account for the app, than you have to create account for "my profile". Why? It can be done in a single step. Guys, please update it. It's time. I love the gym, but I don't like the app.
Title: Needs update

Content: The only benefit is my card number barcode.  Outside that it is a worthless app.  Got locked out and I can reset password online, but app wont accept new the one.    Workouts only sync with other apps one direction.  Loved I could take pic of display at end of cardio machine workout and it would save, but you cant export to other apps (myfitnesspal).  Only will import from it.  Still relies on the website running behind the scene for features.  For such a large company, very disappointed.
Title: Too many flaws

Content: Snap a workout removed!!! What‚Äôs up with that? That was easily the best part of the app. And honestly the only part I used it for. Why in the world would you remove that? Apps are about ease of use and you just made it harder to use ... or at least more cumbersome. Who wants to type in numbers when the snap of a pic can do it for you? I‚Äôll only be using it from now on to bring up my membership barcode and check in. Otherwise it‚Äôs kinda useless for me now.
Title: Where‚Äôs the snap a workout??????

Content: I get enjoyment at PF by being able to work together in a space with so many others who are trying to manage their fitness. The environment is nice because I can watch a game, read about current news, listen to my own music, or just read the Bible on my phone while exercising my heart and other muscles!
Title: Enjoying the Planet

Content: Nice update with new workouts, but I lose the PF PErks link as well as the camera option to log my activity.  I also think adding activities that your facilities doesn‚Äôt have is annoying. You are trying to be like other fitness apps when your just a building. You won‚Äôt ever have surfing or rollerblading. Give me back the simplified app.
Title: New update / missing key features

Content: Love the gym & the app. My only issue is their crowd meter. I‚Äôve gone there when it shows it‚Äôs 2/3 full and there is a wait. I check the app as I‚Äôm waiting outside in the freezing cold and it still shows it‚Äôs 2/3 full. I don‚Äôt know who controls that but whoever is supposed to be doing that is not doing their job!
Title: One issue

Content: I like Planet Fitness a LOT! I use the app only to sign up for training sessions. I would like to be able to see how many times and on what dates I have visited the club in the past. The Anytime Fitness app had that feature and I used it as one way to track my progress. I would also like to see Apple Health / Apple Watch integration with the connected apps.
Title: Good App - Here are a couple suggestions

Content: At $10 a month, you can‚Äôt beat Planet Fitness.  I like that it is a 24-hour facility, so I can truly go at any time I want.  There are plenty of machines to use and I usually get in a good 2-hour workout.  For $20 a month, you can utilize any Planet Fitness location in town and nationally.
Title: Workout Bang for the Buck

Content: Everyone here is super nice. It's inexpensive- the equipment is well taken care of and maintained- you can make appointments with trainers and it doesn't cost extra and you can do everything on the app! Make appointments, see what appointments you have, keep track of your workouts. Super happy!!!
Title: PlanetFitness and the App!

Content: I have a feeling I‚Äôm gonna delete this app.   Trying to book classes at a different club, but 3 of the 4 clubs I would go to aren‚Äôt even listed in the app (or the website). Found a different way of accessing one of those clubs and tried to book a class - which it wouldn‚Äôt let me do even though I‚Äôm a black club member. I‚Äôve emailed them about these issues - if no response I‚Äôm lowering my rating to 1 star.
Title: Buggy and PF locations are missing

Content: I love Planet Fitness! This gym is fantastic, spacious, clean, and contains so much equipment that you'll never have to wait to use your favorite machine ever again! As for the app, I feel that it's very convenient to only have to push a button to show your barcode so you can sign in with ease. Keep it up, Planet Fitness!
Title: PE at PF

Content: I enjoy going to Planet Fitness, but this App is clunky, especially if you have a black card and add a guest. Even with the guest already added, you have to push 4 buttons just to get to his/her pass, which slows down everyone behind you trying to check in. This problem could be easily fixed by just adding apple wallet support, but for some reason, they refuse.
Title: No Apple Wallet Support

Content: The so called ‚Äúcrowd meter‚Äù on the app only shows 1 bar no matter how crowded the gym is. At peak times like 530 it may show two bars but every piece of equipment will have someone on it. I‚Äôm not sure how they measure this but it‚Äôs not a useful feature if you‚Äôre concerned about covid or just having access to the machines you want to use.
Title: Crowd meter doesn‚Äôt work

Content: It would be nice to add a feature to the app so I could potentially find an exercise buddy. Would like to qualify on age, gender, exercise level and goals.  It helps with accountability and for an introvert like me, make a new friend easier. Then let us connect with the PF trainer if we like.
Title: Would love to find a local exercise partner

Content: It just seems like you don‚Äôt really want people to use the app.  Why can‚Äôt I use the app as an active log of activity at PF. Why do I not see how many days of the week and for how long i was at PF. The QR should post on a calendar for the activity scanned for us to track progress. Maybe I need to see what time I last tanned because there is a 24 hour restriction. Why can‚Äôt I track my points and see how many points for each product.
Title: Sufficient

Content: About the only thing of use is the mobile barcode check in feature.   You can‚Äôt link with any Apple products including Apple Watch.  You can‚Äôt link to Map My Fitness.   The biggest problem is the lack of tracking workouts, xcapture.   That feature used to really motivate me to get to the gym to make sure I met or exceeded last weeks activity, now I can‚Äôt compare.   Not sure what anyone was thinking with this app.  It has no value and devalues the club as a whole.
Title: Useless

Content: I love going to planet fitness but my app doesn‚Äôt even load anymore, it‚Äôs stuck at the loading screen. I have tried restarting my phone, deleting the app and nothing works. It been 3 days since it was last able to load, it been stuck on the loading screen like that for 3 days.
Title: Great Gym, Bad App

Content: This app is great to find a club, check in, see class schedules and how busy a club is (though it seems to underestimate crowds).  What I don‚Äôt understand is that all the workouts I‚Äôve looked at are ones you would do at home and not the gym‚Ä¶.what would be more helpful to me are recommended weight circuits and exercises based on your goals.   What would be amazing is if you could also add in common health issues (tennis/golfers elbow, low back pain, knee pain, etc) and recommendations to avoid certain exercises.   Overall, this has been a good and stable app since I joined planet fitness about a month ago.
Title: Good for basic stuff

Content: I updated the app back in July and now all I get is a spinning circle with ‚ÄúRetrieving your membership‚Äù then a ‚Äúcheck your network connection.‚Äù I‚Äôve deleted, reloaded, updated again, and nothing! I‚Äôve tried following the thin thread of customer service for the app, which tells me to check with my local PF people‚Äîwho are completely unaware of how to deal with app issues. Vicious circle of absolutely no help. The app is useless now.
Title: Update killed my app

Content: I seriously cannot praise you guys enough for what you‚Äôre doing for your members. You‚Äôre trying to build more value for us and you aren‚Äôt even charging us!   I‚Äôm a black member for life for how you‚Äôve treated me during these times. Keep up the great work.
Title: Thank you!

Content: I joined months ago and I have only been about to get my app to work once. Since then it has launched the app and sat on a loading screen. Sometimes I get told about an unstable connection which is crap because I have tried in all different places to get it to work. This need fixed or physical keys need to be available. It‚Äôs annoying to have to spend time explaining to the front desk Everytime you go in.
Title: Loading screens‚Ä¶

Content: I understand that all locations are different, but you should still have the ability to track all of the possible machines that you have in your locations. Not having half of the exercise machines makes it very hard to accurately track your work out.
Title: Great but needs work.

Content: Went to my local club once it opened back up. The crowd meter seems like it‚Äôs imaginary because there was a line to get in and every machine was full, but the meter said only 30% of capacity.   There should be a feature for people with the app who are at a location, to either report crowd size, or the app uses location to determine number of people at the gym.
Title: Crowd Meter is Inaccurate

Content: I joined planet fitness recently. Love the equipment and the cheap price. Great facilities. The app is pretty helpful but would be even better if you could make your own workouts by selecting workouts and putting how many reps to do. Please add that feature if possible :) You can select workouts but it‚Äôs a process every single time.
Title: Pretty Good

Content: It‚Äôs a great app. The one thing that would make it better is to have your personal training plan in the app so you don‚Äôt need to keep track of the paper or get another printout with the info on it. It can be linked to your account and come up when you‚Äôre signed in.
Title: Great app. One addition will get five stars

Content: As if all of the new reviews don‚Äôt speak for themselves, the update is trash. Less tracking? Why? You can‚Äôt enter calories burned? The app guesses your burn based on height and weight and it‚Äôs WAY off, on a 60 minute workout it under-counted by over 300 calories, and you can‚Äôt see the weekly/monthly/yearly summary anymore. Seriously, why on earth wouldn‚Äôt you allow people to input the CORRECT amount of calories burned or even distances? Your app developers deserve every single negative review.
Title: Your app developers should be fired.

Content: The videos are helpful and being able to check-in using the phone app is nice. What‚Äôs conspicuously missing is being able to log weight lifting sessions by exercise (weight, sets, & reps). All that‚Äôs available is time spent. Would love to see a list of the gym‚Äôs machines & equipment and be able to log workouts via that list.
Title: Pretty nice but needs more functionality to be useful

Content: Don‚Äôt know if this is an app issue or iOS but no longer works. Asks to refresh and nothing happens  I click check in on my phone. I open app on watch. It tells me to open the app on my phone and log in. App is open on the phone. I click refresh on the watch and the same message comes back. This worked fine for six months. Can no longer use the watch.
Title: Apps no longer works on apple watch

Content: I can download the app from iOS store, but I cannot set up a free account (before or after I joined the club).  The error message continues to say it doesn‚Äôt recognize my email address (which should be moot before I joined).  Regardless I‚Äôm not making any errors in my email address and my home club has confirmed they have the same on file.  I get no message to verify my email per the previous suggestion of the Developer.
Title: Ugh FRUSTRATING!!

Content: I just want to get into the gym & your app makes it impossible. All my other apps work & download without a problem relying on the same internet connection, yet whenever I try even using the app it tells me no connection. I‚Äôve deleted & Downloaded it again numerous times & still no solution. Get your app together because the gym won‚Äôt let me in unless it works & even connected to the gyms WiFi, no connection
Title: Worst app

Content: I am new and I have never been able to see the app, because it‚Äôs stuck on the loading screen. I have cleared my cache and my data.  I am running over my internet I have checked this. I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app countless times, rebooted my phone. NOTHING has worked, it‚Äôs frustrating. I did install it on my iPad so I could get a picture of the membership. But this is ridiculous!
Title: Stuck on loading screen

Content: I‚Äôve had the app for over a year now and just within the last month has it refused to load. I have not been able to check in using the app for weeks now because it will not load at all. I have tried to find who to contact to get it fixed but everything get directed to the general website where there is no information to contact the developer.
Title: Will Not Load

Content: I love everything about the gym and the atmosphere. However the app could use a bit of updating as far as creating your own workouts, workout plans possibly a progression tracker.
Title: App updates

Content: The only thing I use the app for, and something everyone needs the app for, i signing into the gym. The scan in should be on the front page rather than behind multiple clicks after already waiting for the bloated app to open.
Title: Fine app, think about what it‚Äôs main purpose is though

Content: Absolute garbage. Not intuitive. Obviously designed by people who don‚Äôt have to use it. I could ‚Äòfind a club‚Äô but couldn‚Äôt ‚Äòset it as my home club‚Äô from that screen. So yea, thanks for the info on a club 600 miles away. Digital world stinks. Bring back analog.   On top of that, the gym says I have to bring my phone every time in order to check in because they don‚Äôt do plastic cards anymore. How about I find another gym?  Done.
Title: App so bad I cancelled my membership

Content: App keeps redirecting me to the planet fitness website. I open it and it automatically assumes I need an update I have no options to tap on and get out of that screen. It‚Äôs annoying and I have to explain the clerks at my location that their own company is not letting me access the services i am paying to them with this trash app. Fix this bug please. I think I‚Äôll just cancel my membership instead.
Title: Does not work.

Content: I love this app. I think the best thing is the ‚ÄòExercises‚Äô tab that shows you how to use each machine at PF and also shows different exercise and stretching moves. The gym can be an intimidating place and this app is makes it easier. Thank you.
Title: So Helpful and We‚Äôll Put Together

Content: My original review said that the app never loads on my phone. Planet Fitness responded and suggested that I update to the newest version of the app. It turns out that I had VPN running, which interferes with the app. The app started loading once I turned off VPN. Take note, Planet Fitness.
Title: App doesn't load if VPN is on

Content: Strolled into the gym without my card and had to update the app. ‚òπÔ∏è. Now I have lost many features I used in the past. Scan snap a workout? Gone. Pick treadmill for workout? Gone. I have logged my run in the treadmill but I have NO IDEA of how fast I was going. (Who knows that???) There is no way to input the distance I travelled which I rely on as a way to track my personal progress. Given my one day experience and the reviews I am reading, the developers need to do some re-thinking.
Title: Disappointed.

Content: I just purchased an Apple Watch Cellular so that I don‚Äôt need to bring my phone into the gym. Come to find out, the PF Watch app does not work without your iPhone being with you which is counterintuitive. This needs to be fixed as soon as possible. If it is not fixed, I will end my membership and go to another gym by the end of this week.
Title: Apple Watch Cellular Issues

Content: Clunky app, I couldn‚Äôt change my planet fitness club location on the app. There also isn‚Äôt a way for me to copy and paste my ‚Äúkey tag‚Äù so I just had to type it in one by one. Just overall could be a way nicer app considering it‚Äôs a multi million dollar corporation. Cool gym tho $10 a month is a great deal.
Title: Clunky App, Affordable Gym Though

Content: Recently downloaded this app to sign in to check in for my highschool summer pass, and it asks me to login and create a password for it. I do that, and I sign in. And I try to click check in, it tells me ‚Äú4 Hours to go‚Äù and doesn‚Äôt give me any sort of key tag to check in. I literally cannot go into the gym because it keeps bugging, this app is so terrible. And then it tells me I need to join and buy a real pass. This app so bad ü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
Title: Terrible

Content: The app is fine for the phone. Could have better use ability, but it‚Äôs still OK. But it absolutely doesn‚Äôt work on an Apple Watch. This is a big miss as more and more people are opting to leave their phones and just use wearables for short stints like going to the gym. You guys are a big enough company, you should be able to do better.
Title: Doesn‚Äôt work on Apple Watches

Content: Good working app for items most commonly used.   All features are not active but overall it meets my everyday needs.  The app is an excellent way to stay motivate by keeping a running log of your activities which makes you want to work and record your progress daily.
Title: Functional app

Content: I deleted and re-downloaded the Planet Fitness in an attempt to see if that would fix the issue of the app not loading, but the app still currently is stuck on the ‚ÄúRetrieving Membership‚Äù page. After seeing to be stuck on the loading symbol, it then shows a message that reads ‚ÄúOops! Connection Failure: Please check that you have a functioning connection to an internet service.‚Äù
Title: App Not Loading

Content: Do not get this, haven‚Äôt been a member for 2 years and I‚Äôve unsubscribed and spoke to a representative and was told it was successful and won‚Äôt be charged again and they still charged me afterwards. Had a change of card as well as I had lost my previous one and they were still able to charge it smh so, they have access to all your personal information.
Title: Will still charge after you‚Äôve unsubscribed

Content: Joined the gym and can‚Äôt use the app because it wants me to verify my email and the app never sent the email.   I even tried re-registering with a different email same thing. It won‚Äôt let you use the app until you verify your email but isn‚Äôt sending the email for you to verify. There is no button to have them send you another email just a button saying you DID receive the email.
Title: Never received email

Content: The workout tracking for the new app is not usable anymore. Seriously anyone who runs wants to track their mileage, not speed. Nobody‚Äôs speed is going to be completely constant from warmup to run to cool down. Plus a lot of workouts such as couch to 5k are interval based. Either fix this app or  I‚Äôm not using it. The old app was much better for tracking workouts. I care about time exercising and total mileage. If I can‚Äôt track that then the app is worthless to me.
Title: The new app is terrible

Content: Although the look of the new update is much nicer, I agree with many other uses who said the new update is much less user friendly. Like many other people I would track my workouts by taking a photo of the cardio machine and/or manually entering the data into the app. With the recent update I have lost previously tracked workouts AND there is no longer an option to scan workouts. I am not pleased with this update and hope they fix it soon!
Title: Bad update

Content: Crowd meter is a great function that gives you a heads up of the best time to go to the gym. The built in qr scanner links to how to videos for machines in the gym.
